title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 358: Featuring Nic Dowd
description:
On Episode 358 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Nic Down of the Washington Capitals. Nic joined (1:22:40) to talk about playing with a cast of characters in Washington, playing with Biz in the AHL, the birth of his child and more. The boys open the show talking about the recent news surrounding the Chicago Blackhawks and Kyle Beach. The boys then dive into the hot teams around the league and some big contracts that were signed. The guys wrap up the show talking Ryan Getzlaf and give some details about their meet up in Philly.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
